ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: you don t sound convinced by your own words, You know all to well the sacrifices to be made moving into a new environment. These are your friends, Things

"you don't sound convinced by your own words, You know all to well 
the sacrifices to be made moving into a new environment. These are 
your friends, Things won't change with me around, I need thier help, 
not the other way around."
Lunarpine was ashamed to admit it but he knew his presence wouldn't 
change the war. He knew that this was his environment, his very 
function was programmed for this land. Anywhere else he would be a 
liability, not an asset.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Logo morph" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She noticed that his voice tremble a bite with those last words 
that he 
> spoke. She stopped and landed next to him. "Not home, staying with 
friends, 
> but not a home.  Home is here in the trees, hunting, finding a 
companion, 
> flying in and out of the trees, playing in the rivers and running 
on the 
> hillsides.  Wakingup to the sounds of the forest.  Here is home.  
There is 
> being with friends who need your help." She looked at him for a 
moment 
> realized how she sounded. She knew that she was giving up a lot too.
> "When the war is over, I'm coming back here."
> 
> 
> -------Original Message---
> From:   <cyberwolf4@p...>
> Date: Fri Jun 30, 2000 8:04pm
> Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
> 
> Her answer gave him alot to think about. he knew she was sincere, 
but
> on this planet animals didn't help each other without getting
> something back. Is this all his race was,? based on his limited
> knowledge of war and survival Lunarpine knew that one thing is true.
> In war there are no friends, only interests. If this is true then 
why
> was she being so nice?
> 
> Lunarpine took a quick glance behind him, will his new home be this
> way or is there more to his type of beings than he realized.
> 
> "I guess you should call for a ride, Your friends wouldn't know my
> voice."Lets go....."Lunarpine trembled at the thought of leaving 
this
> place for a new life in a strange land,...."Home".
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
